DOC.brief_summary: The purpose open label , two stage , phase II study evaluate efficacy tolerability ZD6474 patient locally advance metastatic hereditary medullary thyroid carcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability ZD6474 Patients With Thyroid Cancer
DOC.criteria: Locally advanced hereditary medullary thyroid cancer Signed inform consent One measurable lesion Brain metastasis spinal cord compression Specific laboratory range Specific heart problem Prior chemotherapy and/or radiation therapy Participation trial within 30 day
